fields.name: Killing is not very nice. (x1):
fields.value: All players will be notified that this ability was used. For the rest of the game, all mafia players will have 0.5x Defense power and will gain the passive 'Let's just be friends :3'.

fields.name: Let's just be friends:
fields.value: 3 (Passive, Locked): Unlocked after 'Killing is not very nice.' has been used. Your attacks are replaced with "Your target gains Defense Power equal to your Attack Power". If no mafia players die within 3 days of gaining this passive, all mafia and town players leave victorious, and everyone else leaves defeated.
